title: Change global app background theme to bright_red

requirements.text: Update the global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens in `frontend/src/index.css` so the application background renders as bright_red across the entire app in both the default/light theme (`:root`) and the dark theme (`.dark`) by adjusting the OKLCH CSS variable values for `--background` and any dependent surface/contrast tokens needed to keep text and cards readable, while keeping `body` styled via `@apply bg-background text-foreground`.

quotes: change the background colour to bright_red

acceptanceCriteria: In light mode, the page background (from `bg-background`) appears bright red rather than the current bright yellow.
In dark mode (when `.dark` class is applied), the page background (from `bg-background`) also appears bright red.
Foreground text and primary surfaces (e.g., cards/popovers) remain readable against the bright red background without requiring per-component overrides.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose these components instead).
Do not edit files listed as immutable by the platform (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`).
Keep styling driven by the existing CSS-variable token system (Tailwind colors mapped to `oklch(var(--...))`).
nonGoals: No new pages, routes, or content changes to the Rose Scents page.
No redesign of typography or layout beyond what is required to preserve contrast/readability with the new background color.
